title: Wintermute to launch multi-chain prediction market amid election betting craze
description: Wintermute announced the creation of a smart contract for a new US presidential election prediction market called OutcomeMarket on Sept. 17. The market, set to launch next week, will operate on several chains, including Ethereum (ETH), Base, and Arbitrum (ARB). Additionally, it will debut two new tokens called TRUMP and HARRIS.
